subs.text: On July 13, I demoed a new Scripting News feature.
I provided a little bit of background info on how it works, but not a technical writeup. Now I have the writeup ready for review.

I think of it as an experimental feature, something on the way to becoming more general, better documented, and designed to interop between blogging platforms and CMSes. That said, the current design is fully capable of being a basis for interop if there's an interest.
It's all very small pieces loosely joined, and based on an open JSON format.
